maqras.text: modeun seonjijaneun neohuiga seonjo deullobuteo balgyeon han geosboda deo na-eun bog-eum-eul gajigo wassnolago malhaess-euna bulsinjaneun dangsindeul-eul tonghayeo bonaeeojin geos-eul midji anhneunda malhadeola
geulihayeo hananim-i geu beol-eul naelisini bola jinlileul geoyeoghaneun jadeul-ui malloga eotteo haessdeonyo
abeulaham-eun geuui abeojiwa baegseongdeul-ege malhagil sillo jeoneun yeo leobun-i sungbaehaneun geos-eul sungbaehaji anihamyeo
naleul changjohasin hananimman-eul gyeongbaehanani sillo geubunkkeseo naleul indohasil geos-ila
abeulaham-eun geuui husondeul-egei mal-eul namgyeoss-euni amado geudeul-eun hananimkkelo dol-agalila
geuleona hananim-eun ideulgwa i deul seonjodeul-ege jinliwa sasil-eul balghyeojuneun han seonjijaga imhal ttaekka ji hyeonse-ui salm-eul hyanglaghadoleug dueoss nola
geuleona jinliga geudeul-ege i leuleoss-eul ttae geudeul-eun igeos-eun masul-e bulgwahani ulineun igeos-eul midji anh eulilago malhadeola
bulsinjaneun i kkulan-i du dosi ui jidoja-egeneun gyesidoeji ani hayeossdeonyo lago muddeola

geudeul-i geudae junim-ui eunhyeleul bunbaehandan mal-inyo hyeonse-ui saenghwalsog eseo geudeul-ege saenghwal-ui yangsig-eul bun baehaneun geos-eun hananim-isila geudeuljung-ilbuegeneun jiwileul daleun ja boda nop-i dueo geudeullo hayeogeum daleun jadeul-eul jidohadolog hayeossnola geuleonageudae junim-ui eunhyeneun geudeul-i chugjeog han jaemulboda deoug joh-eun geos-ila

baegseongdeul-i bulsin-ui muliga doe lyeo haji ani handamyeon hananim-eun jabilousin geubun-eul modoghan gagjaleul wihae geudeul-ui jib jibung-gwa geudeul-i oleuneun gyedan-eul eun-eulo jangsighayeo jul sudo iss-eulila
geudeul-ui jib mundeuldo geuligo geudeul-ui gidaeneun chimsangdo eun-eulo jangsig doel su iss-eumyeo
geum-eulodo jangsigdoel su iss-euli la geuleona i modeun geos-eun hyeonsesaeng hwal-ui hyanglag-e bulgwahamyeo geudae junim ap-ui naeseneun uiloun jadeul-eul wihae issnola
hananim-eun geubun-ui jabilousingyohun-eulobuteo oemyeonhaneun jaleul wihaesatan-eul dusa satan-i geuui chinguga doedeola
geulihayeo satandeul-i geudeullo hayeogeum baleun gil-eseo beos-eonage ha na geudeul-eun seuseuloga olh-eun gillo indodoeneun geos-eulo saeng-gaghanola
geuga hananimkke ileuleo malha deola neowa na saie dongjjoggwa seo jjog saiui geoli mankeum-ina saiga iss-eoss-eumyeon joh-ass-eulyeonman sillo saaghanmulila
neohuiga jeojileun joeag-eulo in hayeo geunal-eneun eoneu geosdo neohuie ge yuyonghaji moshani neohuineun hamkke beol-eul bad-eulila
geudaeneun gwimeogeolilo hayeogeum deudge hal su iss-eumyeo jangnimgwa banghwanghaneun jaleul indohal su issneunyo
hananim-i geudaeleul geoduwogan huelado geubun-eun geudeul-ege eungbeol eul naelisinila
hananimkkeseo geudeul-ege yagsoghan geos-eul geudaeege boyeo julini sillo geubun-eun geudeul-eul jeabhal neunglyeog-eulo chungmanhasinila
geudaeege gyesidoen geos-eul jiki la sillo geudaeneun godbaleun gil-wie issnola
sillo geugeos-eun geudaewa geudae baegseong-eul wihan bog-eum-ini neohuiga god jilmun-eul bad-eulila
geudae ijeon hananim-ui seonjija deul-ege mul-eobola jabilousin ha nanim oee daleun geos-eul sungbaehala ha yeossdeonyo
hananim-eun geubun-ui malsseumgwa deobul-eo moseleul palaowa geuui chujongjadeul-ege bonaeni naneun man-yuui junim-i bonaen han seonjijala malhayeossdeola
geuleona geuga hananim-ui malsseum eul gajigo geudeul-ege gass-eul ttae geudeul eun bius-eossnola
geulihayeo hananim-eun chalyelo ijeon-ui geosboda deo keun geos-eulo geudeul eul beolhayeo geudeul-i hananim-egelo gwiuihagileul balaessnola
geudeul-i malhagil o masulsayeo geubunkkeseo dangsinkke seong-yaghan daelo u lileul wihae gidohala geulihamyeon u liga dangsin-eul mid-euliyo lago hadeo la
hananimkkeseo geudeullobuteo beol-eulgeodueo juni bola geudeul-eun yagsog-eul kkaetteulinola
palaoneun geuui baegseongdeul-ege baegseongdeul-iyeo aegub-ui wang-gug-i na an e issji anhneunyo ttohan gangmul-i nae gungjeon mit-eulo heuleuji anhneunyo geulae do neohuineun ihaehaji moshaneunyo
bojalgeos eobsneun geuligo ungbyeondo eobsneun i sanaeleul bola naega deo hul lyunghaji anhneunyo
geuegeneun geumpaljjido eobs-eumyeo cheonsadeuldo geuleul ttalaojido anhneundanmal-inyo
ileohdeus geuneun geuui baegseongdeul-eul eoliseogge hani geudeul-eun geuege bog jonghayeoss-eumae sillo geudeul-eun joejieun baegseongdeul-ieossnola
geudeul-i hananim-eul yogdoege ha yeoss-eul ttae geubun-eun geudeul-ege eungbeol-eul naelisa geudeul moduleul mul-e igsake hayeossnola
hananim-eun geudeul-ui seonlyeleul hu sedaeleul wihan gyohun-eulo sam-assnola
